coreComponents.heading: Core Components
coreComponents.intro: The strategy incorporates three main "prongs" of analysis:

points.label: Trend Identification:
points.text: Determines the overall market direction using multiple timeframe analysis

points.label: Momentum Confirmation:
points.text: Uses proprietary momentum indicators to confirm entry timing

points.label: Entry Precision:
points.text: Combines price action with volume analysis for optimal entry points

whyItWorks.content: By requiring confluence across multiple timeframes and indicators, Flux Trident filters out low-probability setups. This approach reduces false signals and improves win rate while maintaining favorable risk-reward ratios. The strategy adapts to different market conditions, whether trending or ranging.
